```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(data.table)
library(sandwich)
library(lmtest)

library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)

```

```{r load data}
d <- fread("data/w241_survey_pilot_03_12_22.csv")
```

```{r}
d[ , .N]
d[ , .(GROUP, Q8_1)]
```
```{r}
pilot_group_mean <- d[ , .(mean_donate = mean(Q8_1, na.rm = T)), keyby = .(GROUP)]
pilot_group_mean
```


```{r EDA}
hist(
  d$Q8_1, 
  col = 'steelblue', 
  xlab = 'Willingness to Donate', 
  main = 'Histogram of Outcome Variable'
  )

```
